query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Sì come quando i primi raggi vibra 2 là dove il suo fattor lo sangue sparse, 3 cadendo Ibero sotto l’alta Libra,
query.error: **English:** 1 Just as when the first rays vibrate 2 where its maker shed his blood, 3 the Ebro falling beneath the high Libra,
query.result: 1 Sama seperti ketika sinar pertama bergetar 2 di tempat di mana penciptanya menumpahkan darahnya, 3 Ebro jatuh di bawah Libra yang tinggi,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 e l’onde in Gange da nona rïarse, 5 sì stava il sole; onde ’l giorno sen giva, 6 come l’angel di Dio lieto ci apparse.
query.error: **English:** 4 and the waves in Ganges begin to ripple at the ninth hour, 5 so stood the sun; hence the day was departing, 6 when the angel of God appeared to us, joyful.
query.result: 4 dan ombak di Gangga mulai beriak pada jam kesembilan, 5 demikianlah matahari berdiri; maka hari pun berlalu, 6 ketika malaikat Tuhan muncul kepada kami, dengan gembira.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Fuor de la fiamma stava in su la riva, 8 e cantava ‘Beati mundo corde!’ 9 in voce assai più che la nostra viva.
query.error: **English:** 7 Outside the flames, he stood on the bank, 8 and sang ‘Blessed are the pure in heart!’ 9 in a voice much more lively than ours.
query.result: 7 Di luar api, dia berdiri di tepi sungai, 8 dan bernyanyi ‘Berbahagialah orang yang suci hatinya!’ 9 dengan suara yang jauh lebih hidup daripada suara kita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Poscia «Più non si va, se pria non morde, 11 anime sante, il foco: intrate in esso, 12 e al cantar di là non siate sorde»,
query.error: **English:** 10 Then he said to us, as we drew near to him: 11 “Holy souls, no one goes further unless he first burns, 12 enter the fire and do not be deaf to the singing on the other side,”
query.result: 10 Kemudian dia berkata kepada kami, ketika kami mendekatinya: 11 “Jiwa-jiwa suci, tidak seorang pun boleh pergi lebih jauh kecuali dia terlebih dahulu dibakar, 12 masuklah ke dalam api dan jangan tuli terhadap nyanyian di seberang sana,”

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 ci disse come noi li fummo presso; 14 per ch’io divenni tal, quando lo ’ntesi, 15 qual è colui che ne la fossa è messo.
query.error: **English:** 13 When I heard this, I became like someone who is thrown into a grave. 14 Because of this, I became so terrified when I heard it, 15 like someone who is thrown into a grave.
query.result: 13 Ketika aku mendengar ini, aku menjadi seperti seseorang yang dilemparkan ke dalam kuburan. 14 Karena ini, aku menjadi sangat ketakutan ketika mendengarnya, 15 seperti seseorang yang dilemparkan ke dalam kuburan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 In su le man commesse mi protesi, 17 guardando il foco e imaginando forte 18 umani corpi già veduti accesi.
query.error: **English:** 16 On my joined hands I propped myself up, 17 gazing at the fire and vividly imagining 18 human bodies that I had seen burning before.
query.result: 16 Di atas tangan-tanganku yang bertautan aku menopang diriku, 17 menatap api dan membayangkan dengan jelas 18 tubuh-tubuh manusia yang pernah kulihat terbakar sebelumnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Volsersi verso me le buone scorte; 20 e Virgilio mi disse: «Figliuol mio, 21 qui può esser tormento, ma non morte.
query.error: **English:** 19 The good escorts turned towards me; 20 and Virgil said to me: "My son, 21 here there can be torment, but not death.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Ricorditi, ricorditi! E se io 23 sovresso Gerïon ti guidai salvo, 24 che farò ora presso più a Dio?
query.error: **English:** 22 Remember, remember! And if I 23 guided you safely over Geryon, 24 what shall I do now that I am nearer to God?
query.result: 22 Ingat, ingat! Dan jika aku 23 menuntunmu dengan selamat melewati Gerïon, 24 apa yang akan kulakukan sekarang setelah aku lebih dekat dengan Tuhan?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Credi per certo che se dentro a l’alvo 26 di questa fiamma stessi ben mille anni, 27 non ti potrebbe far d’un capel calvo.
query.error: **English:** 25 Believe for certain that if you were to stay 26 inside the heart of this flame for a thousand years, 27 it could not make a single hair on your head fall out.
query.result: 25 Percayalah dengan pasti bahwa jika kamu berada 26 di dalam inti api ini selama seribu tahun, 27 itu tidak akan dapat membuat sehelai rambut pun di kepalamu rontok.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 E se tu forse credi ch’io t’inganni, 29 fatti ver’ lei, e fatti far credenza 30 con le tue mani al lembo d’i tuoi panni.
query.error: **English:** 28 And if perhaps you believe that I deceive you, 29 turn to her, and have her give you proof 30 with your own hands on the hem of your clothes.
query.result: 28 Dan jika mungkin kamu percaya bahwa aku menipumu, 29 berpalinglah padanya, dan mintalah dia memberimu bukti 30 dengan tanganmu sendiri di ujung pakaianmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Pon giù omai, pon giù ogne temenza; 32 volgiti in qua e vieni: entra sicuro!». 33 E io pur fermo e contra coscïenza.
query.error: **English:** 31 Put down, now put down all fear; 32 turn here and come: enter securely!" 33 And I, still firm and against my conscience.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Quando mi vide star pur fermo e duro, 35 turbato un poco disse: «Or vedi, figlio: 36 tra Bëatrice e te è questo muro».
query.error: **English:** 34 When he saw me standing still and resolute, 35 somewhat troubled he said: "Now see, my son: 36 between Beatrice and you is this wall."
query.result: 34 Ketika dia melihatku berdiri diam dan teguh, 35 sedikit gelisah dia berkata: "Sekarang lihatlah, anakku: 36 antara Beatrice dan kamu ada tembok ini."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 46 Kemudian dia menempatkan dirinya di depanku di dalam api, 47 meminta Statius untuk datang di belakang, 48 yang sebelumnya telah memisahkan kami untuk waktu yang lama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Sì com’ fui dentro, in un bogliente vetro 50 gittato mi sarei per rinfrescarmi, 51 tant’ era ivi lo ’ncendio sanza metro.
query.error: **English:** 49 As soon as I was inside, I would have thrown myself 50 into boiling glass to cool myself, 51 so great was the fire there, beyond all measure.
query.result: 49 Begitu aku masuk, ke dalam kaca yang mendidih 50 akan kulemparkan diriku untuk menyejukkan diri, 51 sebegitu hebatnya kebakaran di sana, tanpa batas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 52 My sweet father, to comfort me, 53 kept talking about Beatrice, 54 saying: "I already seem to see her eyes".
query.result: 52 Ayahku yang manis, untuk menghiburku, 53 terus berbicara tentang Beatrice, 54 berkata: "Aku sudah bisa melihat matanya".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 55 Sebuah suara yang bernyanyi membimbing kami 56 dari sana; dan kami, hanya memperhatikannya, 57 keluar ke tempat di mana orang mendaki.

query.prompt:
